title.rendered: Mumbai vs Tamil Nadu, Indian First-Class Trophy, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Mumbai: Prithvi Shaw, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Ajinkya Rahane(c), Sarfaraz Khan, Musheer Khan, Shams Mulani, Hardik Tamore(w), Shashank Attarde, Tushar Deshpande, Mohit Avasthi, Royston Dias

Probable XI for Tamil Nadu: Sai Sudharsan, N Jagadeesan(w), Baba Aparajith, Baba Indrajith(c), Vijay Shankar, Pradosh Paul, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Aswin Crist, Lakshminarayanan Vignesh, Sandeep Warrier, NS Chaturved/S Ajith Ram,

Venue: Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai

Pitch Report

Type: Spinner-friendly wicket.

Weather: Clear.

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Fantasy Players have been consistently rewarded through the brilliance of Sarfraz Khan and Shams Mulani. While Sarfraz is the leading run-getter (982 at 122) of the season, Mulani has taken the most wickets (45).

It will also be a challenge for the bowlers from Tamil Nadu to dislodge the reputed Mumbai top order. Playing at home further strengthens their chances of dominating.

On the wicketkeeper category, N Jagadeesan is likely to generate a big chunk of fantasy points. Besides inflicting 16 dismissals in his last 3 outings, he has 276 runs with the bat.

Much like Mumbai, Tamil Nadu will also rely on their seasoned campaigners at the top to pile on the runs.
